@graph.description:
## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Inferring single cell trajectories with Scanpy](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/single-cell/tutorials/scrna-case_trajectories/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
